game.name: Batman™: Arkham Knight - A Flip of a Coin
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 배트맨의 유명한 조수 로빈으로 플레이하여 투페이스를 쓰러뜨리고 그의 현금 세탁 작전을 찾아내십시오. 2개의 증강 현실 도전 맵을 포함하고 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as Batman’s famous sidekick Robin, as he seeks to take down Two Face upon discovering his money laundering operation. Includes 2 AR challenge maps.
